com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.handlers.modules.resources

Interface ResourcesModule.SETTINGS

  • Enclosing class:
    ResourcesModule

    public static interface ResourcesModule.SETTINGS

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BASE_DIR
      Base directory path in case local storage is used.
      static String DEFAULT_DIR_PATH
      The file to default to in case requested resource is a directory.
      static String DOWNLOAD_PARAM
      Query param to check in case response is to be sent as an attachment.
      static String NOT_FOUND
      The file to default to in case requested resource is not found.
      static String REDIRECT_TO_DEFAULT
      The strategy to employ in case requested resource is a directory.
      static String REDIRECT_TO_NOT_FOUND
      The strategy to employ in case requested resource is not found.
      static String REPOSITORY
      Underlying storage strategy.
      static String TRACK
      Tracks GET count if true.
      static String UPLOAD_LIMIT
      Max upload size in case of POST requests.

    • Field Detail

      • REPOSITORY

        static final String REPOSITORY
        Underlying storage strategy. One of local, remote, ftp, s3. May need extra settings depending on the repository value
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BASE_DIR

        static final String BASE_DIR
        Base directory path in case local storage is used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UPLOAD_LIMIT

        static final String UPLOAD_LIMIT
        Max upload size in case of POST requests. Units are bytes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRACK

        static final String TRACK
        Tracks GET count if true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOWNLOAD_PARAM

        static final String DOWNLOAD_PARAM
        Query param to check in case response is to be sent as an attachment.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_DIR_PATH

        static final String DEFAULT_DIR_PATH
        The file to default to in case requested resource is a directory. Usually file servers have a default index.html in each folder.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REDIRECT_TO_DEFAULT

        static final String REDIRECT_TO_DEFAULT
        The strategy to employ in case requested resource is a directory. If true, send a redirect to the user-agent. If false, fall back to response publishing the defaultDirPath.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOT_FOUND

        static final String NOT_FOUND
        The file to default to in case requested resource is not found. Usually file servers have a default 404.html to be served globally.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REDIRECT_TO_NOT_FOUND

        static final String REDIRECT_TO_NOT_FOUND
        The strategy to employ in case requested resource is not found. If true, send a redirect to the user-agent. If false, fall back to response publishing the notFound.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
